entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming north 20 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
